name: Saturno's Feast
description:
Singleplayer 2D top-down action game where you control an alien parasite who has to survive and scape an alien hiveship.

Features:

> Fast-paced and responsive combat, with directional melee and range attacks, dash and block.
> Complex enemies, with different mechanics and behaviours. Three types of enemies and two bosses.
> Progression system through mutations unlocked with DNA collected from your enemies.
> Score system.

Controls:

> W, S, A, D to move.
> Left Shift to dash.
> Space to block.
> Left Click to melee attack.
> Right Click to range attack.
> Escape to bring the game menu.

Specs

The game should run in pretty much any computer.

Credits

> Rafael Álvarez Mateos (pogramming, game design, Unity integration).
> David Colina Irazu (2D art, illustration, design).

Contact

Feel free to contact me (rafaelalma92@gmail.com) or post a comment with any feedback, bug or suggestion.
